text: The 1935 Tour of the Basque Country was the eighth edition of the Tour of the Basque Country cycle race and was held from 7 August to 11 August 1935. The race started and finished in Bilbao. The race was won by Gino Bartali. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 47" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 31" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 34" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 30" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7' 23" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7' 35" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 10' 13" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 15' 19" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 16' 39" |} |} ==References== 1935 Bas
title: 1935 Tour of the Basque Country
